data.name: Fantasy Grounds - NPCs: Nobles (Token Pack)
data.detailed_description:
NPCs: The Middle Class


This token pack contains 43 tokens. This pack contains an assortment of non player characters of Noble standing.

This Token Pack includes:

  • 2 Female Courtesans
  • 2 Female High Priestesses
  • Female Knight
  • 5 Female Musicians
  • 3 Female Nobles
  • Female Noble Dancer
  • 2 Female Nobles Elders
  • 2 Female Nobles Sitting
  • 2 Female Nobles Sleeping
  • 2 Female Queens
  • Male Advisor
  • Male Fop
  • 3 Male Guards
  • 2 Male Kings
  • Male List Keeper
  • Male Lord
  • Male Master Cook
  • Male Noble Elder Drinking
  • 2 Male Noble Merchants
  • Male Noble Older
  • 2 Male Nobles Sitting
  • 2 Male Nobles Sleeping
  • 2 male Nobles
  • Male 'The Black Count'

Released on March 27, 2017. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.2.2 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
